rows.label: campfev11_210_175_msg0001
rows.name:
Looks like you've got your hands full
too, Hugo. I hadn't expected you to
be pursuing the Holy Grail independently.

rows.label: campfev11_210_175_msg0002
rows.name:
We will not allow him to escape our
grasp.

rows.label: campfev11_210_175_msg0003
rows.name:
If it comes to battle, then better to face
the Holy Grail with strong Blades.
Blades like Kagutsuchi, and Wadatsumi.

rows.label: campfev11_210_175_msg0005
rows.name:
First, we must head to the location
that we gleaned from the 4th Decade's
intelligence.

rows.label: campfev11_210_175_msg0006
rows.name:
Perhaps something there will reveal
the forward path.

rows.label: campfev11_210_175_msg0007
rows.name:
If the Holy Grail does bar our way, would
you assist us in battle, Adel?

rows.label: campfev11_210_175_msg0008
rows.name:
Believe me, that's always been my
intention.

rows.label: campfev11_210_175_msg0009
rows.name:
My only fear is that we just don't
have the capability to stand up to
him yet...

rows.label: campfev11_210_175_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, you better work out where to get
some of that capability, and fast!

rows.label: campfev11_210_175_msg0012
rows.name:
The Holy Grail seems quite commanding,
doesn't she?
